content:
Certainly! Here's a possible way to rephrase it:

Embarking on the Road to Hana adventure from Kihei, you can reach the Garden of Eden after an hour and a half of driving. This destination is a fantastic place to start your sightseeing journey as it offers a plethora of natural beauty and unique flora and fauna. Did you know that the Garden of Eden was originally part of the Baldwin family's private estate and that it played a role in the filming of several movies, including "Jurassic Park" and "The Seven Year Itch"? As you explore the garden, you and your furry friend will encounter a variety of tropical plants, fruit trees, and exotic birds while taking in stunning ocean views. Don't forget to take some photos to capture your experience!
